name: Paprika
description:
A farming + cooking game I am creating for my personal project on Unity 2020.2.1f1.

In Development!

Controls
  • W,A,S,D: player control
  • E: interact with objects
  • LEFT-CLICK: select a target to attack
  • LEFT-SHIFT: Deselect inventory bag or item
Features Here is a brief overview of the current game feature 

Combat System

  •  Selecting a target using Raycast2D
  •  Line of sight - Enemies must be seen to attack
  •  Dart projectile - fire, frost and lightening

Inventory system & UI

  •  Stackable
  •  Usable
  •  Slots inside bag can be modified
  •  unequipping bags

Enemy System 

  • Slime health system & UI
  • Slime will follow the player in their line of sight
  • slime enemy has different states (Attack, Idle and Aggro)

Hot-Bar UI

  • Drop and Drag skills
  • Action buttons can be pressed with click of a mouse or  1,2,3 (On Keyboard)

Item tooltip UI

  • Title,  Rarity & Description

Key binding Menu

  • Change key binding for the action and player movement

Loot System 

  • Enemy drops items
  • Randomized item drops

Gathering System 

  • Paprika can gather fruits from trees and bushes

Crafting System 

  • Paprika can cook his food, so far only a drumstick
  • Material count, output count and craft all button system
  • specific amount of items can be cooked 

Quest System 

  • Quest giver provides two different types of foundation quests: killing or gathering
  • update objectives

Mini map

  • Mini-map on the top right of the screen to follow where Paprika goes
  • indicator for enemies 
  • indicator for trees and bushes that has fruits
